column4: Samsung SDI making progress in talks with Tesla to supply batteries: source
column5: SEOUL Samsung SDI is making progress in talks with Tesla Motors to supply batteries for the U.S. automaker's Model 3 electric car as well as its energy storage products  a source with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.

column4: UPDATE 1-Samsung SDI making progress in talks with Tesla to supply batteries -source
column5: * SDI to be supplier if Tesla sales beat expectations -source   (Adds share reaction and comments from source)

column4: Samsung SDI making progress in talks with Tesla to supply batteries -source
column5: SEOUL  June 7 Samsung SDI is making progress in talks with Tesla Motors to supply batteries for the U.S. automaker's Model 3 electric car as well as its energy storage products  a source with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.
